showCorrectAnswer: Show correct answer after each question
answerCannotChange: Answer cannot be changed if this option is selected
question: Question
alreadyTired: Note - You have already taken this training!
multipleAttemptNo: You have already completed this training. Only single attempt is allowed.
multipleAttemptYes: You have already completed this training. You can attempt again but score would not be updated.
notConsideredFinalScore: You can reattempt this Training for practice. Your score for this attempt wouldn't be considered against the final score.
choose_any_choice: Please respond before moving to next question
be_the_first_one_to_respond: Be the first one to take the training
correctChoice: Please select correct choice for the question
atleastOneContent: At least one content item is required to create a training
descriptionContentAbout: Description. What is the content about?
notePleaseChooseChoice: Please respond before moving to next question
confirmDeleteMsg: Are you sure you want to delete?
confirmDeleteContentMsg: Are you sure want to discard this content?
alert_invalid_date_time: Alert! Invalid Date or Time! It must be greater than current date and time.
greater_current_date: It must be greater than current date and time.
twoOptionError: At least two options are required
closeTrainingConfirm: Are you sure you want to close this training?
deleteTrainingConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this training?
maximum_images_allowed: Maximum 10 images allowed at a time
atleastOneQuestion: At least one question is required.
maximumTenOptions: Maximum 10 options allowed for a Question.
assigneeTakeMultipleTraining: Untick to allow single attempt only.
correctAnswerSetting: {0} Correct answer shown after every question
